channel.title: DeltaWiped 317 [Revolutionizing Deltas EveryWhere]
channel.description:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/116oz2r.png[/img]
[b]Thanks to I Vain I for the nice banner<3[/b] [b]This thread will be updated regularly, so please check back.[/b]
[b][u]Intro[/u][/b]
I have been working on this for about.. a week now, should have posted the development on Mopar a long time ago, but I was post moderated and didn't feel like it, sorry. Being the unique project that it is, obviously you can tell by its name that one of it's goals is to clean up dead code and optimize Delta. But I started to think: "Many people have done this, and the clean bases are still not commonly used? Why is this?". I eventually found the answer: They don't know how. Most of the people that program Delta don't know much about programming, so think: Why are they going to take a server with no skills and features, when they can just download a source with godsword specials and what not (As 99.9% Of new programmers don't care about stability). So, I thought that I could put guidelines, but I kept thinking and went past that... A whole tutorial based source! Even though the source would be partially blank, there would be hundreds of tutorials & documentation and examples to teach them how to build the server into a server with lots of content, it will even teach them some actual Java (As some rsps programmers don't even know rsps is programmed in Java...) & the rs2 protocol!
[b][u]Content[/u][/b]
It has basic features, but all the major features like item emotes and weapon level requirements, non combat skills, minigames are up to you! Although for each piece of content and example will be given for you to base off of.
[b][u]Media[/u][/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic1-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic2-1.jpg[/img]
[u]Update, Aprill 11th, 2011[/u]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic1-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic2-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic3-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic4-1.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Goals[/u][/b]
[ul][li]To start teaching people how to build off of bare servers[/li] [li]To improve Delta[/li] [li]To teach people how to program [b]properly[/b][/li] [li]To make people feel more comforteble with bare servers, and packaged servers (Packaged version is optional)[/li][/ul]
[b][u]I Don't Care[/u][/b]
I know there are going to be people that disagree with this project, but to be honest I don't care. This project is honestly a lot better than just posting in the downloads section and having people figure out everything themselves.
[b][u]Follow-Up Projects[/u][/b]
Cortex - We all know some lazy people just won't use DeltaWiped, that is why I will be developing a full fletched server full of content out of DeltaWiped: Skills, Minigames, Pking Galore! People who are having trouble with DeltaWiped and want to make a full fletched server can use this as reference or simply leech it.
Veltrix - We all know some lazy people just won't use DeltaWiped, that is why I will be developing a Pking server out of DeltaWiped. People who are having trouble with DeltaWiped and want to make a Pking server can use this as reference or simply leech it.
iTeam - We all know some lazy people just won't use DeltaWiped, that is why I will be developing a unique server that doesn't follow the Runescape story. Anybody looking to create a Nazi Zombie server, Team World Pk server, or anything unique can use this for reference or leech it.
[B][U]Credits (Excluding me, in no specific order)[/U][/B]
winterLove Delta Graham Blake I Vain I asshole_rule

item.title: DeltaWiped 317 [Revolutionizing Deltas EveryWhere]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Ahhh thanks guys, I wanted to login to test a few things I made and whenever I would login it would throw a NullPointerException and log me out. I fixed it.

Then, I would try and login, and my player name would be messed up and it would throw a StringIndexOutOfBoundsException. I fixed that too.

NOW, I tried logging in again, and it doesn’t save the character file for some reason :(, so gonna be fixing this for awhile.

After you start to get into the core of Delta and most wL based servers, you start to realize how shitty they actually are. I can honestly compare Delta’s organization and clutter to a hoarder’s clutter and organization (If you don’t know what hoarding is, google it).

But yeah, after this, I gotta work on Cortex so newfags can leech this, then I’m going to work with RuneSource

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaWiped 317 [Revolutionizing Deltas EveryWhere]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Just a suggestion… instead of hand packaging it, use Eclipse or another preferable IDE to do it, it will take 3/4 less time to do so.

I can’t, my computer is too slow :(. Been trying to get Eclipse/Netbeans to work on it for the longest time now, it would allow me to do so many things much quicker.

asshole_rule:

Wait so you’re finally done packaging it?

No, I restarted this project in early December, all I have to do is package it now, and then test it out a bit.
Then after that I’m going to start rewriting things like player/npc/item/shop processing, packet loading (probably gonna load packets through an array like PI, instead of a huge switch statement like Delta, plus I heard managing it in a HashMap was better, but I tried reading up on it and still have almost no understang of it, so yeah LOL.), connection accepting, combat, cycled events, networking, python/javascript script loading, property loading, etc.

Then I’ll have some actual pictures of the server

I have a feeling that not many people will use this, but that is until I release Cortex, full of content so that the newfags can leech it.
But I don’t want this to be another PI or something lol.

Also does anyone know if I should handle players in a list? or is the current way it’s being handled (in a normal array) okay? Please explain why or why not

tl;dr

for(int i = 0; i < players.length; i++) { players[i].doSomething(); // array }

OR

for(int i = 0; i < playerList.length(); i++) { playerList.get(i).doSomething(); // list }

Read full topic
